name: A Gooey Death
description:
Made for Weekly Game Jam Week 130; Theme is "Dying is awarded"

A slime ends up in an underground world and he is very weak. However, using his own goo from his deaths, he can become stronger. He can jump higher, grab unreachable objects using his goo, and use different abilities!

Controls : 

Arrow keys/WASD- move

Spacebar- Jump

V- Use ability

B- Swap to next ability
